Title: Provides certain penalties for certain traffic infractions by drivers with certain under age license classifications
Summary: Provides for suspension of license penalties for licensed drivers under the age of eighteen for violations of certain restrictions: suspension of license for ninety days for the first violation; and suspension of license for one year for second and subsequent violations.
LawCode: Amd ยง1800, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing certain penalties for certain traffic infractions by drivers with certain under age license classifications
